name: heat, from municipal waste incineration to generic market for heat district or industrial, other than natural gas | heat, district or industrial, other than natural gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12091/documentation

This dataset changes the names of the (internally used) heat product of waste incineration and connects it with the external grid and the respective average energy markets (district heat grid).
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply

exchanges.description: Net heat from municipal waste incineration fed in to district heating grid

flow.name: heat, district or industrial, other than natural gas
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

exchanges.description: useful heat produced in municipal waste incineration (internal)

flow.name: heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
